member.name: T:LoLMasteryManager.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:LoLMasteryManager.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:LoLMasteryManager.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: P:LoLMasteryManager.My.Resources.Resources.bg1
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: P:LoLMasteryManager.My.Resources.Resources.ChampionGGUrl
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to http://champion.gg.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to https://github.com/dewster/lol-mastery-manager-new-client.

member.name: P:LoLMasteryManager.My.Resources.Resources.gomb
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to League of Legends.

member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: M:LoLMasteryManager.ChampionGG.Downloader.ScrapeChampions
member.summary: Scrapes the list of champions from Champion.GG.

member.name: M:LoLMasteryManager.ChampionGG.Downloader.ExtractChampionKey(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode)
member.summary: Extracts the champion key from the given node.
member.param: The node containing the champion data.
member.returns: The key for the champion in the given node.

member.name: M:LoLMasteryManager.ChampionGG.Downloader.ExtractChampionName(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode)
member.summary: Extracts the champion name from the given node.
member.param: The node containing the champion data.
member.returns: The name of the champion in the given node.

member.name: M:LoLMasteryManager.ChampionGG.Downloader.ExtractChampionRoles(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode)
member.summary: Extracts the list of possible roles for the champion in the given node.
member.param: The node containing the champion data.
member.returns: The list of possible roles for the champion in the given node.

member.name: M:LoLMasteryManager.ChampionGG.Downloader.ScrapePatchNumber
member.summary: Scrapes the current patch number from Champion.GG.
member.returns: The current patch number that Champion.GG is serving data for.

member.name: M:LoLMasteryManager.ChampionGG.Downloader.ScrapeChampionMasteries(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Scrapes the list of mastery pages for the champion with the specified key.
member.param: The key of the champion to retreive the mastery pages for.
The role to retrieve the mastery pages for.

member.name: M:LoLMasteryManager.ChampionGG.Downloader.ExtractMasteries(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode)
member.summary: Extracts the list of mastery pages from the given node.
member.param: The node containing the mastery data.
member.returns: The list of mastery pages extracted from the given node.

member.name: M:LoLMasteryManager.ChampionGG.Downloader.BuildMasteryPage(System.String,System.String,LoLMasteryManager.Stats,System.Collections.Generic.List{LoLMasteryManager.Models.Mastery})
member.summary: Builds a mastery page from the given information
member.param: The key of the champion this mastery page is intended for.
The role this mastery page is intended for.
The stats this mastery page is based on.
The masteries belonging to this mastery page.
member.remarks: The mastery page will not have a champion name set. This must be done afterwards.

member.name: M:LoLMasteryManager.ChampionGG.Downloader.GetMastery(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a mastery from the local data file by its ID.
member.param: The ID of the mastery to retrieve.

member.name: M:LoLMasteryManager.ChampionGG.Downloader.ExtractAssignedMasteryRanks(HtmlAgilityPack.HtmlNode)
member.summary: Extracts the number of assigned mastery ranks from the given node.
member.param: The node to extract the mastery ranks from.
member.returns: The number of assigned ranks for the mastery contained in the given node.

member.name: M:LoLMasteryManager.Extensions.GetName(LoLMasteryManager.Stats@)
member.summary: Gets the human-readable name for the given stat.
member.param: The stat value to get the name of.
member.returns: The human-readable name for the given stat.

member.name: M:LoLMasteryManager.Extensions.GetAbbreviation(LoLMasteryManager.Stats@)
member.summary: Gets the abbreviation for the given stat.
member.param: The stat value to get the abbreviation for.
member.returns: The abbreviation for the given stat.

member.name: T:LoLMasteryManager.SW
member.summary: Possible nCmdShow values for ShowWindow.

member.name: F:LoLMasteryManager.SW.HIDE
member.summary: Hides the window and activates another window.

member.name: F:LoLMasteryManager.SW.SHOWNORMAL
member.summary: Activates and displays a window. If the window is minimized or maximized, the system restores it to its original size and position. An application should specify this flag when displaying the window for the first time.

member.name: F:LoLMasteryManager.SW.SHOWMINIMIZED
member.summary: Activates the window and displays it as a minimized window.

member.name: F:LoLMasteryManager.SW.MAXIMIZE
member.summary: Maximizes the specified window.

member.name: F:LoLMasteryManager.SW.SHOWMAXIMIZED
member.summary: Activates the window and displays it as a maximized window.

member.name: F:LoLMasteryManager.SW.SHOWNOACTIVATE
member.summary: Displays a window in its most recent size and position. This value is similar to SW_SHOWNORMAL, except that the window is not activated.

member.name: F:LoLMasteryManager.SW.SHOW
member.summary: Activates the window and displays it in its current size and position.

member.name: F:LoLMasteryManager.SW.SHOWMINNOACTIVE
member.summary: Displays the window as a minimized window. This value is similar to , except the window is not activated.

member.name: F:LoLMasteryManager.SW.SHOWNA
member.summary: Displays the window in its current size and position. This value is similar to , except that the window is not activated.

member.name: F:LoLMasteryManager.SW.RESTORE
member.summary: Activates and displays the window. If the window is minimized or maximized, the system restores it to its original size and position. An application should specify this flag when restoring a minimized window.

member.name: F:LoLMasteryManager.SW.SHOWDEFAULT
member.summary: Sets the show state based on the SW_ value specified in the STARTUPINFO structure passed to the CreateProcess function by the program that started the application.

member.name: F:LoLMasteryManager.SW.FORCEMINIMIZE
member.summary: Minimizes a window, even if the thread that owns the window is not responding. This flag should only be used when minimizing windows from a different thread.

member.name: M:LoLMasteryManager.MasteryAssigner.AssignMastery(LoLMasteryManager.Models.Mastery)
member.summary: Assigns a mastery in the mastery window.
member.param: The mastery to assign.

member.name: T:LoLMasteryManager.MasteryLocator
member.summary: A class for handling the location of masteries within an image.

member.name: T:LoLMasteryManager.MasteryLocator.ArgbColor
member.summary: The representation of an ARGB color.

member.name: F:LoLMasteryManager.MasteryLocator.ArgbColor.A
member.summary: The value of the alpha channel.

member.name: F:LoLMasteryManager.MasteryLocator.ArgbColor.R
member.summary: The value of the red channel.

member.name: F:LoLMasteryManager.MasteryLocator.ArgbColor.G
member.summary: The value of the green channel.

member.name: F:LoLMasteryManager.MasteryLocator.ArgbColor.B
member.summary: The value of the blue channel.

member.name: M:LoLMasteryManager.MasteryLocator.ArgbColor.FromArgb(System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Creates a new from the specified ARGB channels.
member.param: The value of the alpha channel.
The value of the red channel.
The value of the green channel.
The value of the blue channel.
member.returns: An ARGB color with the specified channels.

member.name: M:LoLMasteryManager.MasteryLocator.ArgbColor.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether this instance and a specified object, which must also be an object, have the same value.

member.name: M:LoLMasteryManager.MasteryLocator.GetMasteryPosition(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the position of the specified mastery image within the client image.
member.param: The path to the image of the client to search for the mastery in.
The path to the mastery image to search for in the client image.
member.returns: The position of the mastery image within the client image.

member.name: M:LoLMasteryManager.MasteryLocator.GetMasteryPosition(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Gets the position of the specified mastery image within the client image.
member.param: The iamge of the client to search for the mastery in.
The mastery iamge to search for in the client image.
member.returns: The position of the mastery image within the client image.

member.name: M:LoLMasteryManager.MasteryLocator.GetSubImagePositions(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: Returns all positions of the specified subimage within the specified image.
member.param: The bitmap to search for the subimage in.
The bitmap to search for within the main image.
member.returns: A list of positions that the subimage was found in the main image.
